title: We are hiring an experienced Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to handle performance-focused campaigns
job_overview:
We are hiring an experienced Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to handle performance-focused campaigns.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on contribution

Responsibilities:

Execute and optimize paid ad campaigns.

Monitor KPIs and suggest strategic improvements.

Fully remote role with flexible work hours.

Requirements:

Over 1 year running Google Ads or Facebook Ads.

Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
